commit.message:
typeck2.c (my_friendly_abort): Add URL.

	* typeck2.c (my_friendly_abort): Add URL.
	* decl.c (start_method): Added extra parameter for attributes.
	* cp-tree.h (start_method): Update prototype.
	* parse.y (fn.def2): Update start_method parameter list.

From-SVN: r23003
